item.title: Pepsi shares jump 4% as activist Elliott takes $4 billion stake, sees 'historic' value opportunity
item.description: The Paul Singer-founded Elliott's bet in Pepsi is worth $4 billion, becoming the consumer giant's top five active investors excluding index funds.

item.description: Jay Woods says the pros are watching Broadcom, Dollar Tree and Salesforce this week.

item.title: An options trade on this outperforming timeless fashion stock

item.title: Morgan Stanley downgrades Lam Research, sees a challenging setup in 2026
item.description: Morgan Stanley sees shares of Lam Research falling 8% from here.

item.title: Deutsche Bank upgrades Ferrari, says new F80 supercar will drive major earnings growth
